name: AnimatedModalBarrier
desc: A widget that prevents the user from interacting with widgets behind itself, and can be configured with an animated color value.

fields.name: dismissible
fields.desc: Whether touching the barrier will pop the current route off the [Navigator].

fields.name: semanticsLabel
fields.desc: Semantics label used for the barrier if it is [dismissible].

fields.name: barrierSemanticsDismissible
fields.desc: Whether the modal barrier semantics are included in the semantics tree.

fields.name: semanticsOnTapHint
fields.desc: This hint text instructs users what they are able to do when they tap on the [ModalBarrier]
